title: Hello, Hello
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Elton John & 
Lady Gaga
]
Feet are feeling light
Head on out to see the sights
Ain't life a many splendored thing?
Ducking up and down
All those crazy sights and sounds
Bounce around like puppets on a string
Never gonna find, anything to change my mind
Famous last lines of a fool
[Pre-Chorus: Elton John]
Just when you think
You're chain is just one link
Something comes to tip you off your stool
[Chorus: Elton John, 
Lady Gaga
, 
Both
]
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
My my, what have we here?
What a surprise, What a surprise!
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
I'm not alone it's good to know
Someone's out there to say hello
Hello!

[Verse 2: Elton John, 
Lady Gaga
, 
Both
]
Do a dizzy dance
Twirl around and take a chance
Nothing's easy
Nothing comes for free
Sniffing on a flower
Run through an autumn shower
I'm better off with someone else like me
Me
[Chorus: Elton John, 
Lady Gaga
, 
Both
]
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
Oh my my, what have we here?
What a surprise, What a surprise!
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
I'm not alone it's good to know
Someone's out there to say hello
Hello!
[Bridge: Both]
And I could fly on the back of a bird
And I can shake all the leaves from a tree
If there's a quest I'm a knight
Where's there's wrong I'll do right
Two is better than the one I used to be

[Chorus: Elton John, 
Lady Gaga
, 
Both
]
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
Oh my my, what have we here?
What a surprise, What a surprise!
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
I'm not alone it's good to know
Someone's out there to say hello
Hello!
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
Oh my my, what have we here?
What a surprise, What a surprise!
Hello, hello
Hello, hello
I'm not alone it's good to know
Someone's out there to say hello
Hello!
[Outro: Elton John & 
Lady Gaga
]
Heeello!
Hellooooo!
Heeello!
Heeello!
Hello, hello!
Hello, hello, hello, hello!
